name: backend
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development fastify start -w -l info -P src/app.js
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production fastify start -w -l info -P src/app.js
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development fastify start -l info src/app.js
